Blood Moon Frenzy.name: Blood Moon Frenzy
Blood Moon Frenzy.flavor: With a fearsome roar, you claw at the enemies around you, dealing harsher wounds to those near death.
Blood Moon Frenzy.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see
Blood Moon Frenzy.onHit: 2d6 + Wisdom modifier damage. The attack deals 1d6 extra damage against a target that is already bloodied.

Feral Accuracy.name: Feral Accuracy
Feral Accuracy.flavor: Your claws and eyes glow red, as the blood moon heightens the accuracy of your attacks.
Feral Accuracy.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you can reroll any melee or close attack that misses, and you must use the second roll.

Nature's Grave.name: Nature's Grave
Nature's Grave.flavor: You leap at the enemy in a furious attack. One of you will not walk away from this fight.
Nature's Grave.requirement: You or the target must be bloodied.
